import React from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function Cart({ cartItems, removeFromCart }) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const total = cartItems.reduce( (sum, item) => sum + item.price * item.qty, 0 ); return (

))}
{/* ================= ORDER SUMMARY ================= */}

)}
); } export default Cart;
